channel.title: TempEmailify - A browser extension for Quick short-lived email accounts for free
channel.description:
Hey there,
I just launched my new project: TempEmailify a browser extension for **Quick** short-lived email accounts for free.
tempemailify.versoly.page
Thinking about the problems I use to face while building web applications. I took my note, started listing out problems and the solutions I used at that time. By analyzing I found a simple problem on the usability of temp-email extensions.
It turned out to be a problem worth solving that led me to the idea for TempEmailify!
Any feedback is more than welcome!
